backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor managing profiles, posts, comments, reactions, permissions, and image validation with adult-only access enforcement.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing performance and UX improvements with associated source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing key frontend files, their responsibilities, and recent performance or UX optimizations.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color tokens, themes, and global background/foreground rules for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main router setup with lazy‑loaded routes, ThemeProvider, Suspense fallback, and root layout structure.
frontend/src/components/age/AgeAcknowled: Modal gate that blocks access to age‑restricted routes until the user confirms being 18+, synced with profile and localStorage.
frontend/src/components/Auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth flow, cache clearing, and age‑gate reset on logout.
frontend/src/components/comments/Comment: Renders a comment with author info, reactions, and reporting, handling related async mutations and errors.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Provides the main app layout with header, navigation, mobile menu, and footer, wrapping content in profile and age gates.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobileNav: Implements a mobile slide-out navigation menu with links and login access based on authentication.
frontend/src/components/posts/PostCard.t: Displays a post with content, image, reactions, comments link, and reporting, managing related async actions.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileG: Forces new authenticated users to complete a profile and confirm age before using the app.
frontend/src/components/reactions/Reacti: Shows reaction buttons with icons and selection state, supporting pending and disabled states.
frontend/src/components/state/QueryState: Provides UI components for loading skeletons, error messages, empty states, and background refresh indicators.
frontend/src/components/state/RouteChunk: Simple loading screen for lazy-loaded route chunks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, invalidating related queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendImageUrl.ts: Converts backend image data into a blob URL and handles cleanup when the image changes or unmounts.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Returns the current authenticated identity, principal, and associated user profile state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, identity loading, and exposing identity status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines all backend data queries and mutations for posts, comments, profiles, and guidelines using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind styles and color variables for light and dark themes with custom component styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/FeedPage.tsx: Displays the feed, handles post creation with optional images, and manages post list rendering and refresh behavior.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Shows the landing page with hero section, guidelines loading, and navigation to the feed based on authentication.
frontend/src/pages/PostDetailPage.tsx: Renders the post detail page, fetching a post and its comments, and provides a form for authenticated users to submit new comments.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Displays and allows editing of the signed-in user's profile, loading existing data and saving updates with validation and status handling.
frontend/src/utils/ageGate.ts: Manages localStorage-based age‑acknowledgement state and checks whether routes require age gating.
frontend/src/utils/postImages.ts: Validates image files, converts them to backend format, generates and revokes preview URLs, unwraps backend image objects, and extracts readable error messages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning parameters from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins for the app's design system.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current state, features, requirements, and known issues for the golden‑water community app.
